articles.author: Caroline Frost
articles.title: László Nemes, ‘Son Of Saul’ Director, On Oscar Winner Jonathan Glazer: “He Should Have Stayed Silent” - Deadline
articles.description: Glazer won the Oscar for best foreign language film with The Zone of Interest.
articles.content: László Nemes, the director of acclaimed Holocaust film Son of Saul, has spoken out against the speech made by the The Zone of Interest director Jonathan Glazer, when he accepted his Oscar last weeken… [+1508 chars]
